info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 31 at 1:11PM CDT until August 2 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Sioux Falls SD
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Iowa...
Floyd River At Le Mars affecting Plymouth County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Floyd River at Le Mars.
* WHEN...Until early Saturday morning.
* IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Agricultural land begins to flood, and the low lying areas in the western edges of Le Mars begin to flood.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:15 PM CDT Thursday the stage was 20.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is currently near flood stage and will rise to a crest around 20.1 feet this evening before falling overnight. It will fall below flood stage Friday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - Stay up to date with the latest river observations and forecasts at: www.water.noaa.gov
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional forecast information is available at www.weather.gov/siouxfalls.
The next statement will be issued by Friday afternoon.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SATURDAY MORNING
